title: xraypy
text:
Usage
This module is designed for correct rounding of numbers.

import numpy as np
import pandas as pd
from xraypy.latex_table import latex_range

B=3
x = np.random.uniform(1, 10, size=B)
err_lo = np.random.uniform(0, 1, size=B)
err_up = np.random.uniform(0, 1, size=B)
xmin = x - err_lo
xmax = x + err_up

Non symmetric errors:

pd.DataFrame({
    "x" : x,
    "xmin" : xmin,
    "xmax" : xmax,
    "latex": latex_range(x, xmin, xmax)
})

Type
Description




numpy.numpy.ndarray
string vector






>>> x = np.random.uniform(1, 10, size=3)
>>> err_lo = np.random.uniform(0, 1, size=3)
>>> err_up = np.random.uniform(0, 1, size=3)
>>> xmin = x - err_lo
>>> xmax = x + err_up
>>> latex_range(x, xmin, xmax)
array(['$6.49_{-0.75}^{+0.06}$', '$5.966_{-0.717}^{+0.008}$',
   '$2.3_{-0.8}^{+0.7}$'], dtype='<U25')
>>> latex_range(x, xmin, x + err_lo)
array(['$6.5\pm0.7$', '$6.0\pm0.7$', '$2.3\pm0.8$'], dtype='<U11')
